prompt: Create a vibrant leaderboard page with a light theme and a gradient background from sky blue to white. Place a centered 'Leaderboard' title at the top with a star icon on the right. Arrange the top 3 players in a vertical stack, each with a circular profile image, name, score, and rank badge (gold #FFD700, silver #C0C0C0, bronze #CD7F32) in a card-like container with subtle shadows. Below, display a scrollable list of other players in a grid layout (2 columns) with rank, profile image, name, and score per card. Use a modern sans-serif font (Poppins) with consistent 20px padding and rounded corners (12px) for cards. Ensure high contrast with dark text on light backgrounds.
